summary:
Just as it says, this mod adds a female Falmer Shaman as a follower... which you can also marry... IMPORTANT: Requires Dawnguard DLC.

I\'ve updated a few things and I\'m planning a quest which turns her into a Snow Elf.
descriptionHtml:
As this mod implies, it adds a lone female Falmer follower who resides outside the exit of Darkwater Passage in a small hut and is even a marriage option (and why can you marry her? Because you can!!!). This mod can only work with the new Dawnguard DLC. 

I am currently working on adding a quest to this mod which will turn her into a Snow Elf, so make sure to track this file in case of future updates. 

=====================================================
Lore (if you\'re interested in this sort of thing)
=====================================================
As rumors have proven, some Falmer have indeed begun to rise again from the chasms below. With their kind attempting to re-adapt to life on the surface, some have chosen to attack any unwary victims that cross their paths, however one in particular has chosen to regain the knowledge that has been lost to her kind and revive the ways of the Snow Elf. Hopefully others will follow in her path.
author: SpikeDragonLord
